title: Archive through January 09, 2002
content:
Joe Pemberton: "So, it's almost three weeks later. Can you show us?"   
   
OK, here it comes -- hope you like it:   
 [http://www.mollerup-designlab.com/showpage.asp?ID=56](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803115600/http:/www.mollerup-designlab.com/showpage.asp?ID=56)   
   
Soren O
author: soreno

comments.content: By the way, Volkswagen uses a set of customized Futuras done by Luc de Groot.
